name: 120613 RESERVED ORDER FOR SARA
description:
THIS LISTING INCLUDES:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

• 100 {3.25" x 3.75"} TAGS: letterpress printed carbon and PMS 376 on 600gsm white 100% post manufacture recycled cotton with square corners.

PROOFS:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Please PROOFREAD CAREFULLY!

FINAL PROOF APPROVED: Attached in listing above, 1213 Sara Tags 4.jpg

Invited Ink is not responsible for errors and will not incur the cost of reprinting orders, nor will we refund your deposit or final payment.

Your purchase of this item and approval on the proof indicates to us that you have approved all artwork, text, illustrations and colors, an we may therefore proceed with printing.

Please note that Metallic colors print with only a slight shimmer on cotton stock.

PLEASE NOTE:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Keep in mind that the process of antique handmade letterpress invitations, there will be slight variations in color & print. Beware that colors are not exact on digital proofs and variations will depend on your monitor settings. *Pictures of are of previous orders created by Invited Ink and do not represent your order. Please refer to description in this listing along with proof for specifications regarding this order.

SHIPPING:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
within 10 working day via Priority Mail 

Mahalo nui loa!

© 2004-2013 Invited Ink

name: Business Card Sampler
description:
BUSINESS CARD SAMPLER
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The sampler includes: 
* 3 duplexed business card samples 
* 3+ 1 and 2 color business card samples 
* Invited Ink's chip chart of colors 

Since every monitor is different, our swatch book allows you to see all the colors in person. Includes samples of over 80 colors.


SHIPPING: 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

$5.15 via USPS Insured Priority Mail within the US. 

Additional samples ordered at the same time, ship for no additional charge.


CUSTOM BUSINESS CARD PRICING
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

PRICING FOR CUSTOM 1 COLOR BUSINESS CARDS:
Letterpress printed 1 color front on 300gsm 
100% Post Manufactured Recycled Cotton.
$178.00 for 100 (plus $8.95 shipping within the US)
$214.00 for 250 (plus $9.95 shipping within the US)
$346.00 for 500 (plus $12.95 shipping within the US)
$497.00 for 1000 (plus 15.95 shipping within the US)
*add $35.00 per 100 for 600gsm cotton

PRICING FOR CUSTOM 2 COLOR BUSINESS CARDS:
Letterpress printed 2 color front on 300gsm 
100% Post Manufactured Recycled Cotton.
$208.00 for 100 (plus $8.95 shipping within the US)
$269.00 for 250 (plus $9.95 shipping within the US)
$454.00 for 500 (plus $12.95 shipping within the US)
$594.00 for 1000 (plus 15.95 shipping within the US)
*add $36.00 per 100 for 600gsm cotton

PRICING FOR CUSTOM DUPLEXED BUSINESS CARDS:
Letterpress printed 2 color front, 1 color back, custom duplex*.
$474.00 for 100 (plus $9.95 shipping within the US)
$564.00 for 250 (plus $12.95 shipping within the US)
$744.00 for 500 (plus $15.95 shipping within the US)
$939.00 for 1000 (plus 19.95 shipping within the US)
*Duplexed papers are custom made with your color choices!!!
(If you are looking for a color that is not on our chart let us know 
and we will be happy to try to accommodate your request).

Edge painting is available for an additional $50.00 per 100
and is an available option on cards printed on 600gsm.

Other options are available, please convo us with questions!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

© 2004-2013 Invited Ink

name: Letterpress Wedding Invitation Suite - LOVE INVITED
description:
LOVE INVITED Letterpress Wedding Invitation Suite by Invited Ink

THIS LISTING INCLUDES:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
• 100 {5 x 7} Invitations letterpress printed 1 color with vellum wrap and double sided satin knot
• 110 {A7} Invitation Envelopes letterpress printed 1 color return address
• 100 {3.5 x 5} RSVP Cards letterpress printed 1 color
• 100 {4bar} RSVP Envelopes letterpress printed 1 color return address


CUSTOMIZE THIS SUITE BY CHOOSING:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
• PAPER: Invitation and RSVP printed on white or soft white 300gsm 100% post manufacture recycled cotton cover with rounded or square corners
• INK: colors from our chart
• ENVELOPES: 1 or 2 color(s) from our chart
• WORDING: Is suggestive only, you may change the wording to suit your event


DETAILS AND PLACING AN ORDER: 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Price includes digital proof. Once payment, your customized choices and personalized information is received, we will email your proof within 72 hours. Please PROOFREAD CAREFULLY! Upon proof approval all sales are final. Invited Ink will not be responsible for errors and will not incur the cost of reprinting, nor will we offer a refund.


SHIPPING:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
$30.00 via USPS Insured Priority Mail within 15 working days of final proof approval and payment received.

*For international orders, please contact us with your order destination, we charge cost of shipping once order has shipped. Any and all taxes and duties are the responsibility of the buyer.


CONTACT US:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
• With any questions at info@invitedink.com
• Available in exact quantities, please inquire


SAMPLES:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Samples can be purchased through our shop and include a swatch book of our available colors.


PLEASE NOTE:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Keep in mind that the process of antique handmade letterpress invitations, there will be slight variations in color & print. Beware that colors are not exact on digital proofs and variations will depend on your monitor settings.

Matching pieces including reception cards, maps, menus, program covers, place cards and much more are available, please contact us with questions.

Please feel free to email us with the details of your order, and we would be happy to send you a digital proof prior to placing your order.


CUSTOM DESIGN WORK: 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
